page.title: 15TRADE-SHOPS IN TILSTON
page.content: The village of Tilston has few shops. the vilage has a{post office}and a grocery shop. the post office is run by Mr. Allan and provides stamps, licences, pensions, family allowances, fresh food, frozen food and stationary. the shop run by Mr. Bradley sells and delivers{newspapers. It is open every day of the week. He also sells fresh food and groceries. The shop is attached to his house. Next to Mr. Bradley's shop is a {cobbler's}shop run by Mr Johnson. It is unusual to have a cobbler's shop. Near the post office is a{garage}that sells petrol and repairs cars. It is owned by Mr. Sanday. The former pub, the Butchers Arms, is now an{antique shop. The{two village pubs}sell beer, spirits and refreshments. They have a play area for children. There is a {printing business.
